patterns: What kinds of courses are there?
responses: BE in Biotechnology, Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Science & Engineering and Mechanical Engineering are accredited by NBA, New Delhi
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal
The NIRF rank is 133.
Grade - 'A' by NAAC
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
NMAM Institute of Technology was established in 1986 and is affiliated to the Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagavi.
There are 700+ placements every year by many MNC's.

patterns: Where can i contact the college?

responses: The mail ID is principal_nmamit@nitte.edu.in and call +91 - 8258 - 281039

patterns: what facilities are there for sports?
responses: There are facilities for all sports in B.C Alva stadium.

patterns: what is the name of the principal?
responses: The name of our principal is Dr. Niranjan N Chiplunkar

patterns: How far is college from mangalore?
Which city is the college in?
responses: The college is in Nitte taluk, Karkala, Udupi
The college is an hour away from mangalore

patterns: What are the clubs in college?
responses: AERO CLUB, ROBOTICS CLUB, Internet Of Things (IoT) Club, SAE- BAJA (TEAM NITTE RACING), FINITE LOOP CLUB

patterns: How many books in the library?
responses: The NMAMIT Central Library is housed in the main wing of the college academic building and open from 8.00 am to 11.00 p.m
The total area of the library is 31000sft and accommodates 750 students at a time.
The library has a collection of 86068 volumes of text and reference books.

patterns: What is the intake for CS?
What is the intake for Mechanical?
responses: The intake for each stream is 180.

patterns: Who is the HOD for CS?
responses: The HOD of computer science is Dr. Uday Kumar Reddy K.R
MULTICORE ARCHITECTURE & PROGRAMMING, EMBEDDED SYSTEMS, OPERATION RESEARCH, CAD FOR VLSI & VHDL

NMAMIT has separate hostel blocks for Boys and Girls on sharing basis in order to provide a good environment to the students to continue their studies in a healthy and caring atmosphere. Almost 50% of the students stay at Hostels.

NMAMIT has 7 boys hostel blocks and 4 girlsâ€™ hostel blocks in the campus. Each hostel block is managed under the supervision of a Manager and co-workers at the hostel block. Each room in all the hostels has been furnished with cots, tables, chairs, wardrobe and a ceiling fan.

patterns: Does the college have a fest?
responses: NMAMIT hosts INCRIDEA a national level techno-cultural festival.
